title: cant get riot girl tristana
body: i tried to ge the code from facebook page but it tells The code you're trying to access is no longer available.

replies.body:
Hey! 

If you're having trouble redeeming this, please [shoot us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to hook you up. ^-^
If I recall correctly, I got an email from Bltizcrank granting me my Alistar skin. "Hook you up." Is that a joke? D:
